languages.text: Благодаря суровой дисциплине транспортная магистраль поставляет корабельные боеприпасы, допуская лишь минимальные задержки. Теперь у экипажа артиллерийских отсеков есть больше времени на калибровку и уход за орудиями.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря суровой дисциплине транспортная магистраль поставляет корабельные боеприпасы без малейших задержек. Теперь у экипажа артиллерийских отсеков есть больше времени на калибровку и уход за орудиями.

languages.text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
languages.original_text: Благодаря суровой дисциплине транспортная магистраль поставляет корабельные боеприпасы, допуская лишь минимальные задержки. Теперь у экипажа артиллерийских отсеков есть больше времени на калибровку и уход за орудиями.

traits.locale_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions without the slightest delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions without the slightest delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, munitions are delivered with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions without the slightest delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

languages.text: Gracias a una estricta disciplina, la línea de carga abastece de municiones al resto de la nave tan rápido como es posible. Las dotaciones de los compartimentos de artillería disponen ahora de más tiempo para calibrar y reparar las armas de la nave.
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a una estricta disciplina, la línea de carga abastece de municiones al resto de la nave sin la más mínima dilación. Las dotaciones de los compartimentos de artillería disponen ahora de más tiempo para calibrar y reparar las armas de la nave.

languages.text: 厳格な規律によって貨物ラインによる軍需品配送の遅延が最小限のものに抑えられている。これににより、砲兵室の乗組員たちは、艦船の兵器を調整し、整備する作業に時間を多く費やせるようになる。
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: 厳格な規律によって貨物ラインによる軍需品配送の遅延が最小限のものに抑えられている。これににより、砲兵室の乗組員たちは、艦船の兵器を調整し、整備する作業に時間を多く費やせるようになる。

languages.text: 由于甲板纪律严明，货运区域在运送军火的过程中几乎没有任何延误。如今，火炮甲板的船员有了更多时间用来校准、维护舰船武器。
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: 由于甲板纪律严明，货运区域在运送军火的过程中没有任何延误。如今，火炮甲板的船员有了更多时间用来校准、维护舰船武器。

languages.text: Dank einer strengen Disziplin liefert die Frachtroute Munition mit nur minimalen Verzögerungen. Die Besatzungen der Artilleriestationen haben jetzt mehr Zeit für die Wartung und Kalibrierung der Schiffswaffen.
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Dank einer strengen Disziplin liefert die Frachtroute Munition ohne die kleinste Verzögerung. Die Besatzungen der Artilleriestationen haben jetzt mehr Zeit für die Wartung und Kalibrierung der Schiffswaffen.

languages.text: Grâce à une discipline rigoureuse, la plateforme de fret assure la prompte distribution des munitions. Les équipes des baies d'artillerie ont désormais plus de temps pour calibrer et entretenir l'arsenal du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.

traits.locale_text: Grâce à une discipline rigoureuse, la plateforme de fret assure la prompte distribution des munitions. Les équipes des baies d'artillerie ont désormais plus de temps pour calibrer et entretenir l'arsenal du vaisseau.

languages.text: Yük hattı, sıkı disiplin sayesinde mühimmatları çok ufak bir gecikmeyle teslim ediyor. Topçu bölmelerindeki mürettebat, artık geminin silahlarını kalibre etmeye ve bakımını yapmaya daha çok zaman buluyor.
languages.original_text: By virtue of strict discipline, the freight line delivers munitions with only minimal delay. The crews of the artillery bays now have more time to calibrate and maintain the ship's weapons.
